name: Big Flower
description:
Prototype made for BC Game Jam 2020 by Eel Clan.

__________________________________________________________________

Save the world!  Brighten the day for a few strangers!

Steal flowers from the flower merchant when they're stationary, and looking away from you. Give those flowers to strangers to save the world!

Controls:

X: steal from the merchant

Z: give flower to passerby

R: restart game
